title: "Moon Surgical wins first FDA 510(k) clearance for surgical robot"
excerpt: "Moon Surgical announced today that it received FDA 510(k) clearance for its Maestro surgical robotics system. Paris- and San Francisco-based Moon Surgical designed Maestro to support surgeons in soft tissue surgical procedures."
